snippet: Cuba, although poorer, has a better record on women's status and advancement than the economic behemoth of Brazil, not to mention the rest of Latin America. But will the economic liberalization on the island reverse women's progress there?
abstract: Cuba, although poorer, has a better record on women's status and advancement than the economic behemoth of Brazil, not to mention the rest of Latin America. But will the economic liberalization on the island reverse women's progress there?

headline.main: Cuba May Be the Most Feminist Country in Latin America
